dcterms:creator: Hezhen Hu
Wengang Zhou
Junfu Pu
Houqiang Li
dcterms:description: NMFs-CSL is the most challenging Chinese sign language (CSL) dataset due to a large variety of confusing words caused by fine-grained cues. It contains 1,067 words with 610 confusing words and 457 normal words, with 25,608 samples for training and 6,402 samples for testing.
dcterms:title: NMFs-CSL

dcterms:creator: Jie Huang
Wengang Zhou
Houqiang Li
Weiping Li
dcterms:description: SLR500 is a Chinese sign language dataset containing 500 daily words with 125,000 recording samples performed by 50 signers. It includes 90,000 samples for training and 35,000 samples for testing.
dcterms:title: SLR500

dcterms:creator: Hamid Reza Vaezi Joze
Oscar Koller
dcterms:description: MSASL is an American sign language dataset containing a vocabulary size of 1,000, with 25,513 samples in total for training, validation, and testing. It includes subsets for the Top-100 and Top-200 most frequent words.
dcterms:title: MSASL

dcterms:creator: Dongxu Li
Cristian Rodriguez
Xin Yu
Hongdong Li
dcterms:description: WLASL is another American sign language dataset with a vocabulary of 2,000 words and 21,083 samples. It also releases subsets WLASL100 and WLASL300.
dcterms:title: WLASL
